statements: DELETE FROM data_retention_policy WHERE is_active = TRUE;
DELETE FROM data_retention_policy WHERE id = 1 AND is_active = true;
DELETE FROM data_retention_policy WHERE retention_period < INTERVAL '30 days';
DELETE FROM data_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND creation_date < '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
DELETE FROM retention_policies WHERE policy_id = 10 AND retention_period = INTERVAL '30 days'
DELETE FROM data_categories WHERE data_type = 'Sensitive' AND category_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM retention_data WHERE creation_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL 30 DAY;
DELETE FROM UserActivities WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
